Meta.title: Wishing For Chara
Meta.author: zwa73
Meta.description:
这个mod可以让你使用 regex (chara:|角色:)[CharName] 的形式许愿并生成一个角色 如 "chara:朱亚" "角色:朱亚" 角色名称可以参考汉化文件 (如Elin/Package/_Lang_Chinese/Lang/CN/Game/Chara.xlsx 如果name栏为 *r 则代表使用 aka)
This mod allows you to use the regex (chara:|角色:)[CharName] format to wish and generate a character. For example, "chara:Jure" or "角色:Jure". Character names can be referenced from the localization file (such as Elin/Package/_Lang_Chinese/Lang/CN/Game/Chara.xlsx, where if the name column contains *r, it means using aka).
